DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of significant Shear Wave Elastography Parameters for Prostate Biopsy and Prostate Cancer detection.
DOC.brief_title: Shear Wave Elastography of Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This Study will evaluate the Shear Wave Elastography (SWE) Parameters for Prostate Biopsy and Prostate Cancer detection.
DOC.criteria: Suspicious for prostate cancer with no pretreatment and Prostata specific Antigen (PSA) >4ng/ml or PSA velocity > 0.75 ng/ml per year or suspicious transrectal digital examination Status after external beam radiotherapy of the prostate in localized prostate cancer and suspicious for local prostate cancer recurrence
